ARGUMENT
x y

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | refbas.1 | |- X = U. A |
| 2 |  | refbas.2 | |- Y = U. B |
| 3 |  | #P_refrel | |- Rel Ref |
| 4 | 3 | #P_brrelexi | |- ( A Ref B -> A e. _V ) |
| 5 | 1, 2 | #P_isref | |- ( A e. _V -> ( A Ref B <-> ( Y = X /\ A. x e. A E. y e. B x C_ y ) ) ) |
| 6 | 5 | #P_simprbda | |- ( ( A e. _V /\ A Ref B ) -> Y = X ) |
| 7 | 4, 6 | #P_mpancom | |- ( A Ref B -> Y = X ) |
